text: he imanavala'o! Evi vato vise savala na karo ke jo tamane janavi devamam ave to tamane pasanda na ave ane jo tame kura'anana avataranana samaye te vato vise savala karaso to tamara para jahera kari devamam avase, pachala savalone allaha ta'ala'e mapha kari didha ane allaha khuba ja mapha karanara ane dhairyavana che
